===================================================================
 Lamont Coleman (May 30, 1974 ? February 15, 1999), better known by
 his stage name Big L, was an American rapper. Big L was born,     
 raised, lived, and fatally shot in the same New York City         
 neighborhood, Harlem, which frequently appeared in his rhymes. He 
 is mostly remembered for his freestyling, storytelling,           
 punchlines, his critically acclaimed debut album Lifestylez Ov Da 
 Poor & Dangerous, and his murder at the age of 24. He is          
 remembered to some in Harlem as "The 3rd King" (Tupac and The     
 Notorious B.I.G. assumingly being the other two).                 
===================================================================
